result.name: land-cover-parcel
result.notes: Land Cover Parcel (LCP). These are the sub-landscape units arising from the subdivision of Landscape Description Units based on variations in modern land use and the historic patterns of field enclosure. They are the most homogenous of the range of landscape units, with least variation of attributes.
result.title: Land Cover Parcel
